name: Security Guard
description:
A short horror game. You can finish it within 10 minutes and it has 2 endings. 

You play as a new security guard at a new office. This is your first night shift and you're supposedly to be accompanied by your senior. But, he got emergency...

Controls

WASD to move

Left Shift to run

E to interact

F for flashlight

Esc to quit game

You can view this control on whiteboard (in-game)

Install Instruction

Download game zip file

Extract the zip file

Open SecurityGuard folder > Windows

Run SecurityGuard.exe (Application)

This game was tested on Windows 11 & Windows 10 64bit
